songs.title: Hot Hot Hot
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You are rollin' hard
Santa Monica Boulevard
Black tint glass on your cherry red car
You know very well no one's bad as you are

[Chorus]
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got

[Verse 2]
Oh, you look so hot
Your face is like a map of the stars
Your switch blade smile and your battle wound scars
I'm so hot for you, baby, baby
This love is ours

[Pre-Chorus 1]
You're still in the game
I want you to change
Stop makin' it rain
I wanna be your be your girl
Wanna be your girl

[Chorus]
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got

[Verse 3]
Oh, you look like art
Shinin' like a star in the dark
Lightnin' strikes, you're my infinite spark
Set the world on fire and it's lovely to watch

[Pre-Chorus 2]
They're scared of your name
They know you're insane
I like it that way
I have to be your girl
I gotta be your girl

[Chorus - Variation]
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
You shot, shot, shot, shot, shot
An arrow through my heart now I want you a lot

[Bridge]
Life is like, like a little game
That we like to play
Just for fun, just for fun
'Cause we take nothin' seriously
Nothin's wrong, nothin's wrong, oh
Life is like, like a piece of cake
'Cause we love to play
Just for fun, in the sun
Yeah we know nothin' means a thing cause
We have won, boy we won, won, won, won, won, won, won

[Verse 4]
Oh be still my heart
You're shining like a light in the dark

[Chorus]
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got

You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
You're hot, hot, hot, hot, hot
You know that I want what you got
